member.name: T:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests
member.summary: UnitTests for reversion Testing of angram class.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.TestInitialize
member.summary: Method build service by Angram and IAnagram, for calling from tests.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputOneWord_OneReversedWord
member.summary: Test one word string on reversion.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_EmptyString_EmptyString
member.summary: Test empty string input, should be returned empty string.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputNull_EmptyString
member.summary: Test on null input, should be returned empty string.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputWordWithSpaces_ReversedWordWithUnreversedSpaces
member.summary: Test string with spaces at both ends, spaces should be stay put.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputWordWithDoubleSpaces_ReversedWordWithUnreversedDoubleSpaces
member.summary: Test string with double spaces at both ends, spaces should be stay put.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputStringWithSpacesOnly_SameString
member.summary: Test spaces string only, return without changes.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputStringWithTwoWords_TwoReversedWords
member.summary: Test two words string input, return string of two reversed words.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputStringWithThreeWords_ThreeReversedWords
member.summary: Test three words string input, return string of three reversed words.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputOneWordWithSymbolInTheEnd_ReversedWordUnreversedSymbol
member.summary: Test word with non-letter char on the end, non-letter char stay put and letters should be reversed.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputWordWithTwoSymbols_ReversedWordWithUnreversedSymbols
member.summary: Test word with non-letter char at the beggining and on the end, non-letter chars stay put and letters should be reversed.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputSymbolsStringOnly_UnaffectedString
member.summary: Test non-letter string only, should be without changes.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputWordWithSymbolsAtTheEndsAndInTheMiddle_ReversedWordsAndUnreversedSymbols
member.summary: Test string with non-letter chars on th ends of word and in the middle, should be retirned string with reversed letters and non-letter chars stay put.

member.name: M:Anagram.UnitTests.AnagramTests.Reverse_InputThreeWordWithSimbolsOnDifferntPlaces_ReversedWordsAndUnreversedSymbols
member.summary: Test string of three words with non-letters chars on different places, all non-letter chars stay put and letters chars should be revesed.
